title: E257 Xandy's Castle Roommate and Spicy Lighthouse Decor
description: Welcome to episode 257 where we deep dive into all of our hyper-fixations! Most importantly, for Xandy's last episode we have not one, but two lighthouse stories for you. First Em tells the spooky tales of haunted Point Lookout Lighthouse in Scotland, Maryland. Then Xandy takes us across the pond to the country of Scotland for a murder case in Little Ross Island Lighthouse. And don't worry, the Funcles will reunite at some point in the future, so stay tuned... and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Xandy Schieffer, Em Schulz, Christine Schieffer, Eva Gross)
